mapper.insert: insert into shopsetting( sellerId, shippingCountry, shippingPromiseDays, title, titleInChinese, description, defaultCoinage) values(#{sellerId}, #{shippingCountry}, #{shippingPromiseDays}, #{title}, #{titleInChinese}, #{description}, #{defaultCoinage})
mapper.update: update shopsetting set shippingCountry = #{shippingCountry}, shippingPromiseDays = #{shippingPromiseDays}, title = #{title}, titleInChinese = #{titleInChinese}, description = #{description}, defaultCoinage = #{defaultCoinage} where id = #{id}
update shopsetting set titleInChinese = #{titleInChinese}, descriptionInChinese = #{descriptionInChinese} where id = #{id}
